org.fcrepo.server.security.xacml.pep.ws.operations

Class AbstractOperationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.server.security.xacml.pep.ws.operations.AbstractOperationHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddDatastreamHandler, AddRelationshipHandler, CompareDatastreamChecksumHandler, DescribeRepositoryHandler, DescribeUserHandler, ExportHandler, FieldSearchResultHandler, GetDatastreamDisseminationHandler, GetDatastreamHandler, GetDatastreamHistoryHandler, GetDatastreamsHandler, GetDisseminationHandler, GetNextPIDHandler, GetObjectHistoryHandler, GetObjectProfileHandler, GetObjectXMLHandler, GetRelationshipsHandler, IngestHandler, ListDatastreamsHandler, ListMethodsHandler, ModifyDatastreamByReferenceHandler, ModifyDatastreamByValueHandler, ModifyObjectHandler, PurgeDatastreamHandler, PurgeObjectHandler, PurgeRelationshipHandler, SetDatastreamStateHandler, SetDatastreamVersionableHandler, ValidateHandler

    public abstract class AbstractOperationHandler
extends Object
implements OperationHandler
    This is the AbstractHandler class which provides generic functionality for all operation handlers. All operation handlers should extend this class.
    Author:
    nishen@melcoe.mq.edu.au
